name: The Eternal Eclipse
description:
ETERNAL ECLIPSE

Eternal Eclipse is an extreme psychological horror and romance non-linear visual novel. The story mainly takes place in Japan.

You are Chet. (Name can be Replaced). You're friend Maiku invited you, and the rest of your friend group to stay at his house for a while. You live yourself as normal as possible, awaiting a horrifying and deadly event to occur.

You are in a world where there are gods, spirits and demons. Everyone can have the ability of magic. The strongest natural sources of magic are from the Sun and Moon. Those who have the Fox Dragon's Blessing, or The Werewolf Curse to have the strongest magic.  

Only those apart of the Blanco Family can natural and safely have both. Someone outside of that family is trying to achieve godhood higher than the Blanco family, by forcing an Eternal Eclipse to occur. Using it's power who knows what this individual can do. 

Regardless of the path you choose must help Mike (Maiku) Blanco stop whoever it is forcing this dangerous event to take place.

There are 7 dateable characters (All of age). You must help them through their biggest troubles and save them from their possible death while anticipating this event to start at any moment. Not everyone get's a happy ending anyways. Death can be around every corner...

____________________________________________________________________________

As of this version, this visual novel stands as mostly SFW. Partial  nudity and sex talk are involved.

Warning: This game has Jumpscares and Flashing Lights. This  game does talk and focus a lot on Existential Crisis and Mental Illness, which may be a trigger for some people. Any other warnings will be shown at the beginning of the game.

Updates: The plan is that updates will be posted here on the 10th of every month. That isn't yet a promise but what I'd like to go for. All feedback and constructive criticism is welcome .
